buyers.title: For Buyers
buyers.content:
Access profiles for compliant factories across Africa & the Indian Ocean including product descriptions, special capabilities & sustainability attributes

Find Service Providers across the region to support your business

gm.title: For Garment Makers
gm.content:
Connect to large & small buyers across the US, Europe, South Africa, Australia and Africa

Discover input suppliers from Africa & beyond – including, India, China, Europe –to broaden your sourcing horizons

issp.title: For Input Suppliers & Service Providers
issp.content: Access a unique targeted list of buyers and garment makers to expand your markets

functionalities.title: Intuitive & Useful Functionalities
functionalities.content:
Search detailed & relevant buyer and supplier profiles using our simple & powerful filter engine to find your best match 

Quickly connect to partners with our chat messaging system to initiate new relationships & manage existing ones

Use our detailed buyers’ Request for Quote (RFQ) function to easily request & compare quotes across suppliers to ensure you are paying the right price

marketplace.subtext: Discover a wealth of targeted information & opportunities
marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.content:
Easily post and view Requests for Information (RFIs) listings on our feed and discover buying and selling opportunities for products, services and available production capacities

Post RFIs publicly or anonymously and choose to connect to the best offers

Use our Notification Tags to filter the feed for relevant listings and be notified of opportunities matching your interests
